result.reason: Adding a Reconnect option streamlines the workflow of restarting sessions without manually disconnecting and connecting again.
result.approach: Add a 'Reconnect' menu item to the context menu in 'mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionContextMenu.cs'. Implement logic to invoke Disconnect() then Connect() on the selected connection.
